name: Struggle For Survival VR : Battle Royale
description: You will fighting on this island full of civilization remains, face to hostile human and zombies, no one was spared.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i5 64bits Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i7 64bits Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
